extendedInfo.description: "...on its way to becoming one of the must-have Android game" - PartyHitsRadioA futuristic shoot 'em up designed to challenge your reflexes and wits. Sector Strike combines the mechanics of old school shooters and the aesthetics of modern 3D games.Battle through relentless waves of AI drones in a campaign that will take you through 4 unique environments. Earn credits and upgrade your ship with new weapons, equipment, and abilities.ADDICTIVE power-up system that will keep you coming back for moreUPGRADE your ship with over 20 weapons and abilities such as hellfire missiles and call for reinforcements.ADVANCED GRAPHICS that will take advantage of your new mobile deviceCLASSIC space shooter game mechanics familiar to retro gamers and fans of the SHUMP gendreORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK from Boneyard AudioCLOUD BACKUP SUPPORT ensures that you'll never lose your save game data again, even if you change your device!COMPATIBLE with older devices like the Galaxy AceCUSTOMIZE your ship with custom skins

reviews.title: Absolute sweet
reviews.comment: The game is lovely. It gets better and much challenging. Remember to upgrade every time. Its so much fun.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Top-Notch time killer!
reviews.comment: This is one of the most entertaining game I have ever played! Beautiful graphics with a touch of classic arcades. Upgrading weapons are creative idea by devs for us to play it longer. Running nice and smooth in my device.
reviews.author: Tim Singson

reviews.title: Excellent game.
reviews.comment: I love this game, easy to play and excellent control, other developers should learn frm this type of control. Lovely rules.
reviews.author: mitesh patel

reviews.title: Good and simple
reviews.comment: Great control, love the weapon system. Runs very smoothly.
reviews.author: Yoshi Matzu

reviews.comment: Hmm..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Would be great if we can replay previous level and have a story line. Other than that a great game to pass time! One of the must have on any android phone
reviews.author: Dominic Teo

reviews.comment: Would be more fun if there are more ship options... not just skins. But great game nonetheless
reviews.author: Jann Russell Manzano

reviews.title: Very poor
reviews.comment: This game crushes after the first use .I have download it three times all time i faced same problem every time,please fix it
reviews.author: Gagan Kadu

reviews.title: Purchases don\'t stay
reviews.comment: I had to factory reset my phone, and the purchases I\'ve made have all disappeared. I can deal with replaying levels, I guess, but the purchases I\'ve made should be retained.
reviews.author: Kyle Varisco

reviews.title: Challenging game
reviews.comment: So far I\'m through stage 15 and its pretty good. I\'m glad its unlimted lives, the main challenge is keeping your focus on dodging those shots. Reminds me of vanguard and R-type.
reviews.author: Phil Rosado

reviews.title: Nice so far
reviews.comment: Lacks diversity in enemies and level backgrounds as well as music. It makes up for that with fluid controls, clean graphics and smooth action. Very nice but still needs improvement.
reviews.author: Phillip Smith

reviews.title: Another great Clapfoot title
reviews.comment: Good performance, not overzealous on the micro transactions, great graphics, and a simple but enjoyable concept. Nothing to improve on.
reviews.author: Henry Han

reviews.title: Best game on Android...
reviews.comment: Reminds me of R-type but a heckuvva lot better. Smooth, sleek, quick reload. I would pay for a Sector Strike2. Boom.
reviews.author: Tom F

reviews.title: Boring grinder going for the wallet.
reviews.comment: While the shooting part is somewhat fulfilling after twenty-some stages you realize that you\'ll face the same 5 enemy types forever. Your enemies get tougher faster than your upgrades buff you so you\'ll have to grind hard to avoid opening your wallet. This and the absence of variety in this game is a major turndown. Could have been better.
reviews.author: S6lnitskin

reviews.title: really great shooter game.
reviews.comment: option to use virtual pad control wud be nice.
reviews.author: Jesfer Tan

reviews.title: What fun!
reviews.comment: Great game, fantastic graphics,  old school feel with new age mechanics, and a solid upgrade system. A little more variety and better bosses would garner my final star, but this is well worth a play!
reviews.author: Jared DiCroce

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Upgrades are just the right speed---a little slow, so you\'re inclined to pay, but not ridiculous.  Very fun.
reviews.author: Richard F

reviews.title: Fun, free player
reviews.comment: Controls and gameplay are top notch in android games...one of the only I play, though only time to time. Like the skill element immensely.  Would not pay for credits (even if they were much cheaper), and upgrades cost too much, but doesn\'t look even close to possible to upgrade fully (not to mention skins, consumables, recharge, and using max tractor beam and redos) without paying way too much for credits and energy. Currently on hardcore mode past lvl 55
reviews.author: David Pereira Vargas

reviews.title: Best Jet Fighting Game
reviews.comment: This is very good game. The best part about this game is that even on a basic android phone like lg optimus one, it runs smoothly. Great Graphics too. Hats off to developers.....have done a great job
reviews.author: Navaid Rahmani

reviews.title: TOP DRAWER SHOOTER
reviews.comment: Right from the initial menu this game drips quality. As you reach a few levels in the weapon progression plus the solid, well balanced levels have you giving it \'just one more go\'. You can take advantage of all the games features without shelling out (a direction thats  getting rarer all the time) your hard earned. Definitely worth the download.
reviews.author: Jason Pike
